title: Introducing: Sleepy Dinosaur
body:
So it’s fair to say that Melbourne’s **Sleepy Dinosaur** is a bit of a Flume fan.

From using samples to even reworking Flume’s original Arcade Fire remix, he’s very much indebted to Harley Streten. Comparisons aside, there’s something in the few tracks on his Soundcloud, especially the Slow Magic-esque _Leaving_. ‘futurebass’ ‘chilltrap’ whatever you want to call it, Sleepy Dinosaur is sure to turn a few heads, especially if he begins carving out his own sound.

Comparisons aside, there’s something in the few tracks on his Soundcloud, especially the Slow Magic-esque Leaving. ‘futurebass’ ‘chilltrap’ whatever you want \[…\]
